story: One down, 2041 to go. ;)
Two lines means one + one = two.
Three lines means one + two = three.
FOUR year-olds often put their FOOT (human legs) in their MOUTH - but they are too young to realize.
Three 三 + two vertical lines = five 五.
Indicating six parts of the human body: head, body, two arms, two legs.
This kanji is our good old seven, turned upside down with a slash in it.
Hachi" (eight) begins with the sound of the katakana "ha", and it's approximately the same character.
Kinda of looks like the kanji of one 一 with the kanji of eight 八 added. So think of it as 一 ＋ 八 ＝ 九 (nine).
Two needles crossing marks the spot, or you can use the Roman character for ten (rotated 45 degrees).
Looks like a huge open mouth.
Open the window, new day.
A month is longer than a day because it has extended strokes.
A rice field divided into four parts.
目_目. Boxes with lines that look like eyes.
Tombstone and cross on an old man's grave.
I (i) have five senses including my mouth which I use to taste.
Don't look at the sun directly with your eyes, it's risky!
My companion and I are like two moons side by side.
The sun makes the moon bright.
Someone chanting with their mouth open for two consecutive days.
A diamond sparkles as brightly as three suns.
Three boxes of goods are devoured by the hungry mouths of waiting consumers.
Spine connects head and body.
If you work from Sun UP to Sun DOWN you will be prosperous.
The sun up is early, well before ten.
9am carries with it the rising sun.
Three tens is a generation which is often said to be about thirty years.
The rice field is harvested once a month to get food for our bodies' stomachs.
A nightbreak happens when the sun rises over the horizon (floor).
The moon has a lot of gall (gall bladder) sticking around after sunrise.
The sun spans from horizon to horizon in a day.
The letter "U" is concavely written.
Pictograph of a convex object.
Age 18 = olden times. Looks like an eighteen right?
To use an eyedropper by oneself, aim from above to put a drop into the eye.
A white ray is a drop of sun.
100 hundred turned sideways.
SSsshhh!! we are IN the library", she said, expressed with a finger over her mouth.
It takes many drops of ten to get to a thousand.
What is in a mouth that permits it to speak a thousand things? Yes, a tongue.
It is a thousand or ten? I need my measuring box.
You know that your salary had a rise up when your measuring box has enough dollar bills in it to reach the sun.
Nine plus a drop rounds it off to ten!
The decimal system uses drops of ten as a measurement.
After you have chosen your ten fields of study, measure how good you are at each to find out your specialty.
Ten specialties grants you the title of Dr. with a dot.
Fortune-telling: using a mouth as a divining rod.
A magic wand standing on above the floor.
Roots are below the ground.
The most eminent magician is he who learned to use his magic wand early in life.
There is a mist as the moon fades away in the morning and everyone in the dynasty wakes up.
Imagine an animal with only a mouth and legs.
Eye thought I saw a shellfish legging it down the beach!
A magic wand is needed to make a clam stand upright like a chastely gentleman.
An employee (member of the company) has to clam up his mouth if he wants to keep the job!
As a primitive for see, this is Mike Wazowski from Monsters Inc. (the giant eyeball with legs...)
In the olden times, a newborn babe came out legs first.
In the beginning were just two who walked on human legs.
One shellfish carrying a page balanced on its head.
A stubborn person in the beginning gets something into their head and can't change their mind.
Is there anything as mediocre or ordinary as a drop of piss in the wind?
Tied up, the shellfish had to accept defeat!
I bound ten thousand dollars together and hid it under the floor.
Some Japanese phrases are difficult to wrap your mouth around.
The lack of wind muscle moving around gives the moon a different texture than earth.
Hesig should be BOUND for a DAY (or maybe 10 days - a decameron) for calling this Kanji DECAMERON. See martyrdom (#809).
A ladle binds drops together.
I managed to hit the bull's eye by throwing my white ladle.
The V shape is your neck on top of your collar bone, or the straight line. Yourself, or the rest of your body is below that!
This is a fish hook, that pulls out the fish guts.
The riot police broke up the riot by dragging the rioters away by their tongues with fishooks.
If you get a needle in your eye that is hooked in there, get to a hospital floor straightaway.
Keep an eye on your tools while you work at the table.
Ten tools will tell you what's true.
This is Bender the crafty robot from Futurama who was designed to bend I-beams.
The left side of my brain possesses the faculties needed for logical crafts, like engineering.
The right hand is for putting food in your mouth. The other hand is possessed for ass-wiping!). 左右 (さゆう) : left and right, influence, control, domination; 右 (みぎ) : right hand side.
Possessed by the Earth's gravity, the moon stays by its side.
To bribe someone, money is a necessary possession.
This next song is a tribute to a little shellfish friend of mine who was tragically crushed by an I-shaped table.".
A well crafted page uses paragraphs to separate items.
This SWORD is so sharp, its blade can cut the top part of カ off in カタナ.
The part of a sword where a drop of blood can usually be found is the blade.
The seven samurai used their swords to cut their opponents.
Looks like breasts and and a mouth which could easily seduce and summon a man to do things.
The sun can seduce you with its seductive shining, and make anything that you couldn't see evident.
When you have both money and the power of the sword, you can make the rules.
The wealthy guy with the sword standing next to the king, that's the vice-roy who does all the dirty work.
Someone's head is about to be separated from his body by a saber while he's kneeling down so opens his mouth and says don't!!
Today, the program "Sesame Street" is brought to you by the letter "T".
Actually village here means town, like one that has lots of streets and is surrounded by all the rice fields.
A mouth on the street asking for things: "Can I get some help?! Can I get directions, Can I have some money? Can you please speak English?!".
Street head - My grandfather had a wrinkly bald head and the wrinkles looked like little streets which could take me places.  So I pretended to choose a place on the head to go.
A child's body with spread arms for a hug from momma.
The child's arms flailed around at the sight of the hooked tool the dentist was going to use to fill his cavity.
The child is complete even without arms because he can get better bionic ones.
To remember the order of strokes of woman, remember a female ninja is called a "kunoichi". That is, く(hiragana) ノ(katakana) 一(kanji, ichi=one).
A woman is fond of her child.
Women share a common likeness. Their mouths are always open, whining about this and that.
The two breasts of a mama (mother) who breastfeeds.
Ariel the Little Mermaid's clamshell bra was held to her breasts by piercings (pierce).
My elder brother was basically a mouth on legs when he was a teenager.
Ten elder brothers can overcome anything.
A little penguin with its wings at its side.
Only a few people can make an ugly face like that.
A person stretching their arms and legs to look large and scare a bear away.
Two evenings too many!
The evening is young, the moon is not full, but rather a crescent moon.
Eventide is just another word for evening, and it has the word tide in it which we associate with water.
A young magician likes to practice outside in the evening with his magic wand (as opposed to the old magician who wakes early to practice with his wand in eminent (#51)).
In the evening, when it becomes dark, open your mouth to say your name so that people can recognise you.
Indiana Jones running with a hammer jumps up and grabs the lip of cliff just in time to evade the huge STONE rolling out of the mouth of the cave!
Using DNA matching, a very little bit of flesh can be used to show the resemblance between family members.
That stone has sparks coming out of it! Someone must have poured nitrate acid on it.
To smash a stone you need to hit it nine or ten times.
Sand starts as stones, then gets smaller like gravel, and later there are fewer and fewer pieces of sand you can see because its so small.
Your saber resembles a plane when you throw it trying to hit banana peels you threw in the air.
A ray of light is not a wave but made of little photons with human legs.
A large person with a big drop of sweat dripping off of him because he is overly plump.
Imagine four hungry mouths all sitting around the table. They are all banging their utensils on the table waiting for a big meal to be placed in the centre.
The ST. BERNARD DOG lifted his large NOSE high in the air to find out where the stinking smell comes from.
Exquisite women are few and far between.
You focus by concentrating your eye on fewer objects, an easy way to economize your thinking process.
The thick cliff walls protected the children from the sun.

I find it strange that so many people commit suicide in Tokyo by throwing themselves in front of the train. To me when I look at this kanji, I see a train just about to come out of a tunnel, and above the man waiting for his oppourtunity where he can end it all.
So as not to confuse this with river (#146) think of streamers falling down.
There were 3 little islands in the stream who all decided to set themselves up as independent states.
Obey, Obey!" says the brain-washing scientist as he sends a stream of orders to fill your head.
Dropping a hooked walking stick into the water causes a splash. (The primitive is often contracted to just two drops and a walking stick).
Icicles start with 1 frozen drop of water.
It would take an eternity to count all the drops of water.
White is a symbol of purety, so white water is pure water, the precise definition of spring water.
Follow the springs down the cliff and you will find a nice little white meadow and flatlands.
Let's petition to save that beautiful meadow from overdevelopment by signing on this page.
If you don't know how to swim, you'll be in that water for eternity.
The marshlands near Mordor seduce Frodo into gazing upon them, and he falls into the water--splash!
Open sea is a lot of water in the middle of nowhere that can wash away almost anything.
A creek is a small trail of water easily crafted with a stick.
To make soup you just take water and add (+) the rest of your ingredients.
The morning tide is basically, well, water in the morning.
The water that flows from the meadow is the source of life for the wild antelope.
Water comes off the lively speaker's tongue.
To extinguish a spark, you need water.
But of course a teenager sweating water is a typical situation as they're all over the place.
A river CAN exist only if there is WATER.
Please supply a guest traveling in the moor who stays overnight with water and white sheets.

This is my favorite story. Simply associate the sad moment of an old person, standing near the water of the lake and looking at the moon reflected in the lake. The created primitives themselves are put so beautifully, that you will not forget this kanji.
A fathom is the unit you use when making rules about water's depth.
Remembering soil is easy. If soil is soft, you can take a walking stick and plunge it two* feet into the ground.
SPIT goes from my MOUTH to the GROUND.
The ground at the base of a cliff must suffer from enormous pressure.
This cape refers to land, not the strange gear superheroes wear.
Before the Great Wall of China, there was a<span className="part"> dirt hedge that spanned across.
Piling soil upon soil for aeons is how squared jewels are formed deep in the earth.
The king used a special seal of ivy leaves glued onto his document.
From the cliff bank all you can see in the distant horizon is water.
At the Buddhist temple the monks are seated on the ground, glued there in meditation.
When the sun starts to shine on the temple, it's time to get up.
Soil is scooped up into a ladel. The extra drop is brushed off to make it level.
For some reason, this kanji reminds me of a person running, her arms (the two drops) raised up, because she caught on fire!
To fight fire with fire would just add inflammation to a situation.
An anxiety feels like fire in the head.
Drink water and burn twice as many calories as you eat... you'll definitely get thin.
Imagine old gas lamps which had a flame to light up the street signs.
Many farms are created by first setting fire over the land to clear the land for the fields.
What a disaster! First a fire, then on top of it came floods.
The fire underneath the cliff will eventually turn everything above to ashes.
The FORTUNE TELLER was burned by FLAMES on the spot because she was accused of being a witch.
Shine a fire's light on something to illuminate it in the dark.
When I think of bound up cooked rice, it makes me think of sushi, which in turn brings to mind fish.
You need water and fishes for fishing.
The ri is a Japanese way of measuring the area of the GROUND underneath a RICE FIELD.
If you burn the ground of a rice field with fire, eventually it will turn black.
Theres BLACK on the GROUND...most likely someone spilt some black ink.
Japanese carp are massive fish - they are measured in ri!
I did such a quantity of work that when nightbreak came, I was asleep on the computer.
I threw my Rindows computer off a cliff because it's worth a smidgen - less than a rin.
You can't bury computers underground, because of the dangerous heavy metals, so you hide them behind an equally large mound of soil and hope no-one notices.
Muslim women wearing veils (HOOD) all look the same, you can just see ONE MOUTH and very little else.
All the animals in the cave den share the same water.
Some bodies are not the same as others because they have a trunk.
Look over yonder ! That tiny dot is robin hood at the mouth of his secret cave !
An especially esteemed alien has three antennae on his helmet and you can see his mouth at the bottom.
Children learn kanji characters underneath a house.
A guard is usually "glued" to the house he watches.
In the beginning the house I just property but it has a roof when its finished and looks perfect.
You can <span className="meaning">proclaim your opinions from the comfort of your HOUSE and have it SPAN the entire globe these days via The Internet.
I use a candle until the wee hours at nighttime to review kanji!
A woman relaxing in a peaceful house.
The WOMAN spent all DAY preparing a banquet in the HOUSE.
The strange house has a sign saying "DRAW NEAR" in its window, instead of a 'Beware' sign. It must be a trick!
Remember Ducktales? That rich duck had that room in his house where he kept all the wealth, including his rice supply! He had so much in that house you could even swim in it!
It takes a lot more than one clam of savings to buy a house on a street.
If you need a story for a tree, then you need to be hit by one.
A grove has at least two TREEs.
Three trees together representing a forest.

The Japanese Judas-tree is the tree on which Judas hung himself to the ivy (Judas the traitor of the Christian bible). Just picture Judas hanging himself, using ivy as a if it was a rope. In Chinese this is the Cassia-bark tree.
The wood from oak trees and cypress trees can be used to make barrels in which white wine is aged. What's more, I love white wine with an oaky flavour...
Wood at 90 (nine * ten) degrees is a frame.
At Christmas time, on the treetops, people used to place great big candles (Now we usually place a star instead).
A shelf is a wooden companion to books, but you have a lot of books so you make a shed with lots of shelves just for books.
From the tree straight into the mouth is the best way to eat an APRICOT!

In Japan, a paulownia (きり）is known as the "princess tree". It was once a traditional TREE planted at the SAME time as the birth of a daughter. It would grow fast enough that, at the time of her wedding, it could be used to make a dresser as a wedding present for her.
Plants don't become trees straightaway.
A tree withers away as it gets old.
Wooden wands are the crudest. They are nothng compared to their carbon fibre equivilents.
Measure the town / village to see how much wood (trees) we need.
To avoid inter-acting with one another some people go up a tree and keep an eye out for anyone coming.
My wooden desk is so messy, it looks like a strong wind from the fan machine blew my things all over it.
The origin of a book is paper made out of TREEs. ONE tree can make many books.
Botanists like to identify trees by hooking tags on them.

Years-Months-Days: It takes many years for a cliff to form or erode. A tree takes many months to grow. But days pass by regularly - so in this way, we see the movement of time such as with a calendar.
In most cases relaxing on a tree is my weekend plan.
It's been so parched recently that your furniture suddenly catches fire.
Remember these as a set: The tree (木) does not yet (未) have exremities (末) of vermilion (朱). It only has short branches.
The tree has reached the extremity of its growth and no longer produces small, new branches at the top which grow into long branches. Instead the existing top branch just grows longer and longer.
The extremity of a wave of water is the splash, which is the last part of the wave to survive if you don't include the foamy water that slides up onto the beach.
My mouth has not yet swallowed the food because the flavor is so delicious that I keep chewing it.
My younger sister is NOT YET a fully grown WOMAN.
It's autumn: only one vermilion leaf on the tree has not yet fallen.
Which tree would you buy stocks in - the healthy one on the left with a nice tree trunk, or the one with only one vermilion leaf left on the right?
The young little girl held a cute flower in her right hand as if she was about to hand it to her mother.
Grass grows in earlier than flowers.
Flowers for the old man suffering in the hospital.
A tolerant person with a wide open mind will ignore seeing grass (marijuana) in the house of a friend.
This Dr. uses a needle to give slightly diluted flower water medicine.
On top of the leafs a flower appears, promising new generations for the old tree below.
If I find out this furniture you're selling me is made of imitation wood, I'll put you in the graveyard.
Without water a vague location in the desert becomes your grave.
The soil under a graveyard is full of graves.
He made a livelihood out of robbing graveyards in broad daylight before sunset.
In the moonlight of the graveyard I hear a zombie say, MMMMM..EMM...BRANEsssss (membrane).
If you plant seedlings in a field eventually they will flower.
When your wife's legs get huge hairs on them it is surely a bad portent for things to come.
The pits of a peach tree look like turtles.
Sauron's One fiery eye stare at Frodo and it is a sign of portent. Evil will become whomever the eye is staring upon.
A large dog, dripping drool.
The turtle and dog live next to each other peacefully and are always nice so they can maintain the status quo, or existing state of affairs.

The computer won't stop beeping, which is making the chihuahua bark, and it's driving this guy insane. The only solution he can come up with is to throw them both on the fire and finally enjoy the silence.

Flesh of a dog over a cooking fire = "hotdog". There are all sorts of things in hot dogs. Believe me, you don't want to know what sort of things . Visualize the hotdog curling as it cooks, to remember the unusual way the flesh primitive curves in this kanji. (tweaked version of ziggr's. Thanks!).
Reeds are the only flowers that wild dogs like to fire up and smoke while they are playing poker.
Actually when hunting it may be a good idea to use a pack of dogs as your personal guard.
The cat hid in the flowers of the field from the wild dogs.
A cow tried to climb up a vermilion tree, but in doing so, it broke its two bottom branches off.
Think of not special people, but special animals. The sacred Hindu cows are special - they can wander around the temple without fear of becoming roast beef.
The revelation makes the cow's mouth drop down, "Hamburgers are made of what?!".
I've never seen a cow with human legs before!
In Japan, you always wash with water from the shower before you enter the bathtub.
Let me introduce you to the two handle umbrella under which 2 people can be happily jammed in.
One Japanese farmer I know is so small minded that he thinks the entire world is jammed in the borders of his little rice field.

Some people think drinking tea is boring and quaint. That's why I spice mine up by adding one cocktail umbrella, which of course is made from a small wooden toothpick supporting a paper umbrella with flowers printed on top.
I wouldn't mind a meeting of mouths with her, she's really fit !
In order to build a pagoda in this small Japanese garden everything has to fit: the soil to the left and the flowers in the upper right corner.
To be king you have to be a real crafty one !
The king is said to have only one family jewel below the belt...
On treasure island is a single house - where all the jewels are stored.
The king of the Oysters produces special Vermillion pearls!
The king ... can see clearly the present state of affairs in the land. (maybe he hees them in the crystal ball on the left?).
Oh no ! A pack of dogs has bitten the king. He has turned into a crazy rabid lunatic !
Ancient Rome had Emperors instead of Kings, and they wore white robes. Thus an emperor is a king in white. (make sure you picture a roman emperor not a japanese one and you'll be ok).
The mouth of the king is displaying his bling.
The fat king hogs the whole space under his umbrella. (tweaked version of radical tyro's story. "fat" makes a more vivid image for me.).

The fat king under his umbrella offers useless advice to the workers. "You'll need the whole tree to plug that gap". Imagine a grossly fat, incompetent king under a parasol giving annoying advice to sweating workers who know what they're doing. (I always have trouble bringing up the "whole" primitive. This story reminds me how to build that part. ).
The king of LOGIC is the computer.
A lord is a little drop down from King in hierarchy.
Visualize an idiot trying to figure out how to extinguish a candle. He sees a glass of WATER and decides to pour it onto the CANDLESTICK to put it out. Water spills everywhere.
The main pillar in a house should be made of the biggest and strongest tree - the lord of the trees.
The fat king taking up the whole space under the umbrella actually isn't fat - he just has two big gold bars hidden under his clothes.
Pig iron is basic/crude metal, that is, before it has been processed.
This is the bowl of an alchemist: see how he mixes metals in his bowl, as he follows the instructions from his book?
I can't believe no one has used this one yet: Copper is metal which looks almost the same as gold. Really, look it up on Wikipedia, it's yellow and it's shiny (atleast in some compounds)!
All the people that go to the Japanese festivals to catch fish part time are suckers. Me? I'm a pro. I bring a big-ass golden ladle. I'm a true angling professional.
Remember the story of the needle in the haystack. Why would someone even look for a needle if it wasn't a gold needle?
A piece of metal with a name inscription in it.
Tranquillize using a metal syringe to put someone at ease in order to get the truth.
When we go out on the ROAD-WAY, we often risk our own necks. That's why I travel in another way - by train.
For guidance on the road-way, glue a GPS unit to your car.
A cross-road is another way to say a 'crossing'.
The car went too swiftly through the road crossing and was hooked by the cops for being too speedy.
A cow creates a road by eating all the grass on its path.
When you see a compelling ad and have the urge to go to White Castle, you know it's time to hit the road.
I used my pants to make a rope, which I then used to escape from prison; hence the naked, hairy legs running along the road!
Separate the environs (borders) by placing daggers on the road.
The cops don't PATROL anymore - they just flood the road.
My car is so fast it can go through ten rice fields in ten minutes.
When you put your car on the road you should always take along a few friends to be green. Don't travel one after the other in different cars.
My car got stuck in a rut and required nine people to get it out again. If a train goes off the rails it takes nine cars to get it back on them.

The car is a cattle-car, used to transport animals for the butcher's meeting - a convention on new butchering techniques. Hear the screams of the animals as it pulls up in front of the convention hall, where the butchers are waiting with their knives out front.
When I get horny my flesh sword sticks out in front of me.
Each person is gifted with a mouth to get us into trouble and a pair of walking legs to get us out!
The forest ranger checks the status of each tree, but there are too many so he just checks one tree from each pattern (type) of tree.
There are so many abbreviations and acronyms nowadays that no brain can remember each of them. Mnemonic: ab-brain-each-ation.
Each person under my roof is treated as a guest.
Sign the guestbook page with your forehead. (Picture a guestbook full of forehead prints like thumbprints).
In SUMMER you are hot from the top of your head down to your walking legs.
The best way to dispose of a nasty bit of wind is to let it go and use those walking legs to dissapear. Nobody will ever know it was you.
The taskmaster strips and has a tree between his legs while most only have a twig.
Water each flower or the petals will wither and fall.
The king's crown was blown off by the wind. "Oh well," he said, "it's just a superfluous symbol.".
British army cars are at the service of the crown.
Rays of light emitted from Apollo's chariot = radiance. Don't put the sun into this kanji. The rays are coming from the chariot directly!
An army chariot on the road carrying military supplies.
Remember the SUPERFLUOUS CROWN that flew away in the WIND? Well now the king is saying "i should have had the thing GLUED to my head from the BEGINNING".
Last night's date with Miss Sweden was like a dream. She even laid flowers over my eyes to crown the perfect evening.
A whirlwind digs a hole in the ground throwing out lots of dirt until it ends up with a giant pit.

Two little aliens in a trenchcoat and top hat, trying to look TALL. The bottom one, in the glass helmet, is under the coat. The top one has his top hat pulled down in disguise, so all you can see is his mouth.
In basketball tall children receive and enjoy all the attention so enjoy it the most.
Welcome to our cram school: you will receive a rounded education on our grounds.
Imagine tall children sitting round the fire toasting marsh-mellows until they are a ripe toasty brown color.
The tallest Pavilion crowns the street.
Tokyo, capital of Japan: tall buildings, small people (compared to the buildings).
A tourist in the capital is hot and tired but finds a water fountain which so refreshing and cool.
Imaging the sun rising over the capital--classic postcard scenery.
If fish were cities, the whale would surely be the capital.
The cottage abode is so small - it has an umbrella for the roof; soil for the floor and room for only one mouth.
If my LIDDED CROCK has the same CIRCUMFERENCE as my head, I like to use it as a HELMET.
Imagine a road built so well that it takes only a week to travel the circumference of the earth.
What a handsome gentleman. Standing straight like a soldier or samurai.
A samurai's mouth has words of good luck. So talk to one if you get a chance!
The image is a robust green bulging-muscle cartoon turtle. A TMNT with hachimaki. turtle-samurai.
You have a fancy villa with robust flowers, in a hamlet with other nice villas.
The samurai found a crown that he wore as a belt on his waist, just above his legs. I don't think he will ever sell it.
In the schoolhouse there are kids always studying.
In a schoolhouse in class: 1) you see something on the blackboard, then 2) you memorize it.
The trees flourish in the classroom because the students take care of them.
Make sure you practice writeing kanji with a brush every day before the sun goes down.
A brush laying in dirty water is a haven for bacteria. In Chinese this character means Tianjin, an old city which is a haven of Chinese culture.
The taskmaster herds the cows together to get them to breed.
Aggression is a well-honed craft for any decent taskmaster.
If you end up in failure, you give money to the taskmaster to train you.
The taskmaster is stingy even with small objects like toilet paper, so he hands out only one sheet of paper per person.
An old taskmaster deliberately torments students by flicking their ears when they aren't looking. They never catch him but they know it's no happenstance (coincidence) !
You're in awe and revere the flowery phrases of the taskmaster.
A pictogram of someone with a top hat saying a two letter word from their mouth after the censors have gotten a hold of it.
To admonish is to enforce awe by means of words.
A plot is a summary of the events an author planned in a book, and it can be given in ten words.
The wild dog family visits their cousin in prison. They exchange words over the interphone at the visiting booth.
Revise your words until you have what you want to say nailed down so you don't waste time when you place an order.
I said some bad words, and my mother chastised and condemned me by washing my mouth out with glue instead of soap!
The best type of Japanese instruction is full immersion, which consists of going to Japan and swimming in the stream of words that surrounds you every day.
I picture a seductive female reading aloud the words of the imperial edict to the masses, thus "seducing" the masses.
Words of good luck are packed into fortune cookies.
Tales are always spoken, not written, and because of this, words fly out of your tongue when you talk, rather than your pen.
Eternal words are ones that you chant over and over in recitation.
A poem is a temple of words.
The simplest word to say is I (me).
People will say (言) almost anything to make a sale (売); don't believe everything you read (読).
To tune an old-fashioned radio, you turn the dial the full range of the circumference, until you can clearly hear what's being said.
Think of an online discussion group where misunderstanding someone's words leads to flaming. An angry discussion = inflamed words.
The words of the very young are useless without consent from their elders, even if they promise.
A peta activist speaks at a meeting of butchers to rebuke them. He uses powerful figures of speech to make his case.
Each Indian tribe crafts their arrows in a certain style..
In an essay test, you are judged on both your choice of words and your writing style.
This is the old style ii [two] - After shooting one arrow (the dash top left), I have two arrows left in my quiver (bottom left).
An astronaut lands back at the launch range, kisses the earthly domain beneath him with his mouth, then heads off to a fiesta to celebrate a safe flight.

A Geisha beckons you with her index finger, and as you approach she runs her fingers all over her body in an attempt to seduce you. Keyword meaning : “invite”.
Settlers use there fingers to clear the land of stones to pioneer a new living space.
(Image: the most snooty prim and proper English Lord with white gloves clapping only with his fingers. "Oh bravo old chap. Bravo...").

You're using a hammer to drive a nail into a plank, but you miss and strike your fingers, ouch ! PS: the character does not mean "to go on strike", it will be very helpful in the long run to create images that convey the proper sense of the character!
You approach the thief from behind, stick your finger at his back to fake a gun, and say the phrase "You're under arrest". Then you tell him why he is being detained.
Someone stuck their fingers in my cottage cheese! I'm going to have to discard and abandon the lot!
To kidnap wrap your fingers around someone's mouth, put the knife to their throat, and turn them in the direction you want them to walk.
My grandma always pinched me with her fingers when i was playing with her handpicked antiques.
The rabbit pointed his finger at the turtle fomenting him and said, "I challenge you to a race!" The rest is history...
Finger lickin' delicious.
At the Buddhist temple you'll see the a monk that can hold and support himself upside down with only a finger.

A teacher tells students to be quiet by keeping her tongue in, closing her mouth, and pulling her finger across her lips like a zipper fastening. One student is still talking so she looks at him and says "that includes you!"
A military leader in his chariot is brandishing his finger at the enemy, crying "chaaaaaaaaarrrgggeeee!".
It's only conjecture (opinion formed from incomplete info) but you tell you friend not to get too close to the turkey because it might push you with its feet.
My piggy bank is so heavy that I cannot hoist it using just my fingers. If this were publicized some one might try to take it.
When a man can finally bring up the big question and propose to a lady, he takes her finger and places the ring on it just so.
Boss yells, "Who damaged the Xerox machine?!" fingers of employees point at one another.
If your fingers fit around it you can pick up a broom and tidy up.
At day break your fingers start shouldering, or to assume, a large amount of work.
When playing sports you need to dispose your belongings on the sideline with your fingers, then get a good stance with a strong foothold and get ready to run.
A sketch describes a seedling of things to come which you make with you fingers.
You can maneuver furniture with just your fingers if you're big enough. It's good exercise too.
A pervert meets a woman. The pervert tries to touch the women with his lustful fingers as a welcome. The woman takes a vase, lifts it over her head and smashes it on the pervert's head...
You put up a notice that reveals your pet peeve and says "no finger snapping during the siesta."

Think RPG. The wizard points his finger to the guard and the ivy he has just animated with his magic wand climbs down the wall to hang the poor guy, opening the way for the adventurers into the dungeon.
My stones are so huge that it takes two hands to polish or grind away at them to make them look nice
Moses had to take precautions and received the ten commandments with two hands before throwing a fiesta with the jews.
To keep the commandments safe Moses made a weapon and wooden contraption from a tree.
An Egyptian embalmer reaching both hands into the dead pharaoh's nose nostrils and yanking out handfuls of brain.
This kanji is for severe punishment. A man has his shackled hands placed on a wood block and they're chopped off with a saber. No more stealing bread in the Middle East...

A famous ninja once pressed his two hands and saber into the soil of his temple, before going onto a mission from which he never came back. Think of some sort of signature that he left behind him. The mold of his two hands and saber has since become a popular attraction in the area.
Spinal tap: "Every other band's amps go to ten. But you see my extra stroke of genius - these go to eleven.".
If you're a money genius, you can afford a lot of property with your riches.
A tree genius is a lumber jack and knows lots of stuff about trees.
You make a deposit of money in a bottle every month because you suppose it will help your child in the future.
You know a genie exists in a bottle. The hard part is going through lots soil to know where the bottle is at!
You get a thumbs up fist from your friend and only then you know that it's time to make your move.
You've just arrived in Japan but didn't take along your phone so you get a new portable phone with a cool turkey picture on it.
You catch up with your friend and reach out to get him with your outstretched fist.
A baby reaches out for a bottle and sucks for milk, but has to take breaks to inhale.
Handle with care... carefully hold the Nitroglycerin within your fingers with outstretched hands for fear of it blowing up in your face...
Both a meter and a yard are about one arm-length.
I sleep in history class with my mouth tucked under my arm.
One officer can change the course of history.
It's starting to GROW LATE, so God will take the SUN, and TUCK IT UNDER HIS ARM, and walk away. In the morning, he'll bring it back, so don't worry.
A stiff hard drink on the rocks after it grows late is a way to unwind after a long day...

This keyword should really be "again" not "or again" (and the primitive meaning is crotch) Here is some context: think of the phrase "Jya mata" "じゃ又" which is a farewell similar to "then again". Also "Mata ne" "又ね" and mata ashita (again tomorrow) "又明日"。 Note this kanji is rarely used, most of the time JP people spell it out "mata" except for in the last example: 又明日.

The animals boarding Noah's Ark all came in pairs – but Noah had to carefully check the two crotches in each pair to ensure that the animals were of different sexes and thus able to further their species after the flood.
Children going around the mulberry tree singing "This is the way we wash our crotch, wash our crotch, wash our crotch...".

On Vessels that travel long distances, sailors often get quite lonely as they are only one of a pair.  They keep turkeys on the vessels, but not for use as food. The lonely sailors take turns enjoying the turkey's crotch.

Think of the flower-vessels as a the Greenpeace vessel “Arctic Sunrise”, only instead of a rainbow there is a big flower painted on the hull (this will come back in seize (#701) and harvest (#908)). Think of “flower-power” and of the “peace” in “Greenpeace” and it will make some sense hopefully. -- In this kanji, we see an inauguration speech being given before the Greenpeace vessel is set afloat and sent to safeguard our planet.
A pack of genetically-modified wild dogs is seized by a group of Greenpeace activists and taken onboard the Greenpeace vessel (the flower vessel, see safeguard (#700)).
Some guys like their woman to treat them like slave crotch.

This woman is angry because of the guys in the previous frame who pay more attention to her crotch than her heart. I prefer to decompose the kanji in three elements here because it is easier to read like a mnemonic.

A good friend is always at your side. ---- I teach at a Japanese High School, and I often see chummy male students grabbing each other's crotches in a joking manner. It's still weird to me, but apparently reaching to your side and grabbing you neighbor's crotch is a great way to express friendship.
Don't let good friends slip out between your fingers, and don't let yourself pull out yours either.

Well, you usually use your fingers to throw objects used as missile weapons. Easy. By the way, for those of you looking for a less anachronistic image for the missile primitive as a modern rocket, try a slingshot. it's a crotch (originally a tree branch) that sends missile projectiles flying into/like the wind. And for this present kanji, it is something you naturally use with your fingers...
A water missile hits and the target does not have a defense, so the ship sinks and drowns.
Establishment can be attacked by words or by missiles. Writers will use words, whereas militars will use missiles.
Your car has missiles?! That beats mine, hands down.
Samurai's husk/shell/armour is superfluous to missile attacks.
Picture sliding down the branch of a tree (in this case a pine tree or any tree with needles) and getting a bunch of needles stuck in your crotch--ouch!!
You get a branch with your fingers to show your friends your fencing skills.
The tree's primary branch is known as the bough.

The limbs that this kanji represents are parts of the body that are connected to the trunk, like the main branches to a tree (“arms and legs” is the second meaning of this kanji). In other words, limbs are "flesh branches".
You wrap some toilet paper around the stalk or plant stem of a flower and give it to your partner.
You come home and see a peculiar piece of toilet paper on the ground which makes you suspicious.
Imagine a lightweight vehicle or a light-truck with a load of spools driving down a road ever so lightly, careful not to let any of the spools roll out onto the street.
Oh come on people - say what we've all been thinking: the uncle is that creepy guy towering above a little one's crotch.
Creepy uncle volunteers as gymnastics coach so he can eye the team from below as he superintends.
The unmarried uncle's house is the picture of loneliness.
Uncle (the one who is lonely and coaches kids in his spare time) is actually a graceful guy once he hits the water, as he used to be part of the swimming team in his youth.

I think of an anti-hero (Dirty Harry etc.) for this primitive, whose trademark for disposing of villians is not an honorable fight, but a kick in the crotch and then a shove off a cliff, which goes against the ways of traditional heroes.
As the villain (anti-hero) is tumbling down the slope, he activates gadget skis to escape, spraying soil everywhere as he flies down the slope.
Of course, trees are anti-plank. Wouldn't you be if you were a tree?
Pretty obvious: to return is to turn back on the road you're on and go the opposite way.
The goal of marketing is to get people who are naturally anti-buying to spend their shells (money). Peddlers must be really good at this because they sell stolen goods.
A pictograph of Wolverine's adamantium claws.
A womans claw can be gentle if you act appropriately.
A fledgling is hooked on its mother's breast milk.
Floating rubber ducky in the water!!!
The leader in this race is the turtle! It appears he has covered the vulture’s feet in glue, so that the vulture cannot get off the starting block.
It's easy to picture a leader that uses a big dog to exhort (encourage) his people to do more so they can win awards.
You pick cherries with your fingers, then along comes a giant vulture and picks up the whole tree with its claws.
A vegetarian vulture is munching on a flower, perched on a tree, patiently waiting for a patch of vegetables to grow.
The birdhouse is the brothel (someone else said so) and of course everyone is welcome - thay accept any crotch.
Please accept this finger I confer to you," you say, imparting it to your yakuza boss.
If you really love someone, you won't keep them in a cage-like birdhouse relationship, but rather open the door and let their heart walk around freely. Think less about "I" (あい) and more about "we".
You're at a restaurant and raise your finger to indicate to the waiter that you want to pay. Your friend elbows you in the ribs -- it's his shout, and he insists on taking care of the bill.
The Batcave is very wide and has a lot of elbow room for Batman to do his yoga.

When Batman's cave isn't wide enough to hold all of his new inventions and gadgets, he has his friend Superman use his superstrong fingers to grip the entrance of the cave and broaden it, making more elbow room. Goatse-style visuals at your own risk.
Elbonium: a new mineral found in wide caves shaped like elbows and made of metal.
Opening a stuck valve requires two hands and a lot of elbow grease.
A turkey with his elbows sticking out showing how masculine and grand he is.
When someone's elbow is above your mouth he/she is probably standing on a pedestal or platform.
While standing on the pedestal at the award ceremony, the recipient, a heartlessly negligent man, neglected to mention the people that got him there.
From his water pedestal Neptune reigns and governs over his sea empire.
Many men, before they commence their relationship with the woman of their desires, place her on something of a pedestal, which often leads to disappointment later on.
The body part people put on a pedestal is the womb because it has to carry the fetus.

This is either a love scene or a murder scene that you are seeing through a window. The love scene: through the window of a house (from a distance), you see a pair of human legs, then elbows, and then some pink hearts floating up like in a cartoon. The murder scene: peering through the window of a house, you see a gruesome murder scene. Human legs dangling from a ceiling fan, an elbow sticking out of a wall, and a heart still beating on the carpet.
Going, going, GONE!", said the gravedigger as he shoveled soil onto the body's protruding elbow (the last bit left to cover).

This kanji shows up in a lot of words related to the legal process. Try this image: using a very outdated judicial method, the people of Salem dunked accused witches in the water until they were all gone.

At the local company they have a very gory way of getting rid of incompetent people: they arrange a business meeting in a very special room where the walls are ... meeting. Not surprisingly the boss is never present at these meetings, he's the one who pushes the button that sets the walls in motion.
Sexual climaxes don't always happen on the bed; they sometimes happen against a wall or on the ground!
components: against a wall or on the ground

parts.meaning: against a wall or on the ground

story: You book a room in a love hotel called "Climax House".
Arrival of a hero always happens at the climax of the movie, and of course he carries a saber to defeat the enemy.

The taskmaster doth a new movie with a great climax to bring about change in his students.  

doth - archaic 3rd person singular of 'do'
The 69 position allows both parties to mutually give themselves pleasure.
She can't take care of it so a mother must abandon or forsake her baby, by tying it to a tree with a belt buckle.
When a lot of parents bring up their children they make sure their body is full of good food and education.
A yakuza taskmaster is bringing up his infant and removed bad behavior with his fingers. If the infant wont eat the taskmaster will scatter it's food on the ground.
Scene at the baby factory: Manager: "Good news! Your infant has been allotted human legs which are sufficient for normal movement". Parent to be: "Thanks a lot!".
Everyone is allotted a metal gun" (US constitution according to the NRA).
Sulfur is like a rock, but it can stink like a stream of infant doodie.
Infant Moses placed in the water and sent down the current of the infant stream.
A government agent has the license, or consent from the government, to kill with his deadly elbows and human legs.
A prostitute tempts a client with her mouth.
Suddenly, a cactus comes out of the ground with a sign that reads: exit. Now you can leave the desert! (Note: giving this primitive the meaning 'cactus' can be useful later).
Pictograph of a mountain.
With fingers fumbling around trying to get the key in the door so he could exit, the bungling husband woke his wife as he tried to leave for a rendezvous with his mistress.
A mountain-sized stone is known as a boulder.
Burn enough charcoal and you'll have a mountain of ash.
On the left, there are three branches of mountains. The roads branch off to each of them.
This mountain peak is just below the mountain top.
Sam and Frodo were steadfast companions even as Mount Doom crumbled above them.
To maintain secrecy, secret societies invariably have to house themselves in the mountains.
When I think of honey, I think of a bee hive, which is a house that invariably has insects.
Storm is a full-blown wind that rips the mountains off the ground (you see one flying here).

This strange mountain is actually a promontory where rugged hillbillies live.  

promontory - a raised mass of land that projects into a lowland or a body of water (in which case it is a peninsula).
Pictograph, see book. * As a primitive, using the image of going through a door, even one that stands alone with the frame and no wall around, helps flesh out the primitive “enter”.
During a traffic jam your car can't enter the roadway as it's crowded with cars.
When something is entered by a dagger, it ends up being cut in several parts.

In the case of true poverty, not having money is only part of the problem. There are other difficulties the impoverished face as well, like lack of education, class structuring, etc., but that doesn't really matter. Just remember that the money is only part of it, not the whole.
Your head is partitioned and one part of it promulgates and remembers the characters you learn.
I always enter the doors to the public restrooms with my elbows because I don't want to touch the door with my hands.
Following up with the "entering public restrooms" story for the right-hand primitive: public restrooms always reek of pine tree scented disinfectant.
A venerable old man, or elderly man, is given feathers by the public once he reaches a certain age.
Take care what words you say in public lest you be sued in litigation.

This could be seen as a very accurate pictograph of another type of valley: a valley mouth open under the umbrella of inner labia, with the outer labia parted above. There are even more connections to be made among the primitive keywords and the visuals, but i will enter no further...

This story is quite lascivious, sorry... Now, imagine you are at a 混浴　（こんよく） [two kanjis we now know] Onsen (温泉), and you are watching a woman bathe. Just picture the water dripping down her cleavage (that valley in between her breasts). Note: cleavage in Japanese is 谷間.
Imagine a house big enough to contain an entire valley. might want to live there. And now imagine cleaning it. . . . Maybe not . . .
Think of what happens when the snow contained on top of the mountains melts: it turns into water and flows down onto the rooftops of all the houses in the valley below and eventually dissolves.
The lack of contact with a woman's valley will leave a man with a strong longing and desire for love.
A woman with an abundant valley wraps up her bosom in a cloak.
Picture the molten lead (the heavy metal) being discreetly drained out of the factory into a gully behind.
Waters in a gully run alongside the path.
You won first prize in a shellfish eating contest. Unfortunately you spent the whole night in the outhouse after.
Every major political party, if personified, would look like a giant outhouse walking around with human legs spewing out a constant stream of bullshit from its mouth.
In most communities you will be hauled into the main room of city hall (a public chamber) if you use the ground as an outhouse and spit out of your mouth.
It's usual to take your towel with you when you go to the outhouse at the onsen (hot springs bath in Japan) so everybody doesn't see your stuff too often.

Compared to pants, a skirt is the raiment (clothing) to be wearing when you want to use one of those Japanese toilets. It makes it so much easier: you just walk in the outhouse hike it up, and do your business.
You manipulate your body sexually with the palm of the hand, then clean your hands in an outhouse.
A tent is made with a pelt covering hooked on a branch planted in the ground.
Waves are the ocean water's pelt (skin).
An old woman is seen here as a woman with waves (i.e. wrinkles, creases).
You expose that you are a gentleman when you use your fingers to drape over the shoulders a lady's nice pelt covering for her.
Before scissors or knives, sharp stones were used to break apart and rend pelts.
If you wear a quilt cloak of fur (pelt) you are sure to incur the wrath of animal rights extremists.
The bone float is incomplete and the remainder needs to be filled in.
Someone goes on the path of martyrdom and their bones are kept out in the open for a decameron (10 days) in memory.
Vermilion t-bone steaks are particularly tasty and dissimilar to other steaks, if served rare.
Some ladies want to get boned straightaway in order to augment their chances of breeding.
A file, or line up, of skeleton warriors armed with sabers.

They tried issuing the skeleton warriors with proper garments to wear, but they kept getting split by the sharp cracked bones or by their sabres. In the end, it was decided they look scarier naked anyway.
The file of warriors sits around the intense fire and discuss their ardent belief in conquering oppressive kingdoms.

In Japan when someone dies (death) they cremate the body and pick out the remaining bones with special chopsticks. In this case, they're out of chopsticks so they decide to use (gasp!) a spoon instead.
I imagine an interment as a funeral. At this funeral it's an open casket, and the dead body (death) is holding flowers with both of its hands.
At the birdhouse night club someone winks at you the instant you walk in.
Your ear is like the eye on the side of your head for seeing things, but there is hair around it that creates jagged lines.
You put your ear next to a womans crotch...and somehow, from it, you hear the words "Take me....".
The gist of it is this: We take the money and run!  I have no interest in anything else.
TAKE the UTMOST care when you SUN bath all DAY, or you'll get burned from your EARS to your CROTCH.
Take the utmost care that you don't have your finger in the way when you take a photo or snapshot.
Vincent Van Gogh's greatest shame was cutting off his ear to win the heart of a woman.
Worst post, or occupation in history: quality checker at the kazoo factory. Imagine the toll on your ears!

The trick for me is to remember that the 耳 ear is to the left of the 口 mouth. However, this is easy because a true holy man uses his ear to listen (i.e., to God or his supplicant) before he opens his mouth to speak, unlike a charlatan who just makes something up. Of course, kings are often true holy men and prophets (e.g., King David in the bible).
Only a brave student would be so daring to wear a spike in his ear in front of Japanese taskmasters!
I promise to use my ear to do nothing but listen ... stick a needle in my eye, cross my heart and hope to die! (Intentionally said backwards to get the order of the primitives correct).
When you are in New York City you have to be alert, i.e. in the "New York State of Mind": you need ten eyes to make sure no one will go through your garments and pick your pockets.

A mandala is a graphic representation of the universe, here split in 3 planes of existence, the sun representing the cosmos, the eye is the human observer, and the crotch is the slow animal state of mind which people get ridiculed for.
Meditating to your mandala while rain water is coming down outside makes you feel loose and overflown with relaxation.
When something catches my eye, I take out a few clams and buy before anybody else does.
Working in retail you learn the placement of any item should be at eye level so it's seen straightaway.
A football player takes a penalty kick after the other team is penalized for looking at the referee in the eye and threatening him with words and a saber.

Elegant and calm old housewives with English accents dining together at a house party. The hostess brings out a dish of hors d'oeuvres: a spike of metal with an eyeball and a heart skewered on it. Upon being offered this treat, one of the housewives says in her English accent, "I'd rather not.".
The fly is wrapped in a spiderweb voicing (voiced) "Help me, Help Me" under the watchful eye of the spider whose turbid venom is dripping like water from her fangs.

First we have a jewel. Next we have the great eye of Sauron searching for the fellowship hiding under the many ceilings during their journey. The fourth and fifth primitives are the mouth of Gollum always mumbling “My preciousss ring”; and Pippin's scarf! Placement: the eye appears at the top similarly to how the Great Eye of Sauron is perched atop the Dark Tower.
You've probably guessed it by now, this is the road that Sam and Frodo take to send back the ring to Mount Doom! (see previous frame, the jewel is replaced by the road).
Even though it is argued size is not important, I'm sure most women would like their husband to have a big one.
A husband uses his fingers to lend a hand and aid his family.
A husband stops to take a leak in the water of a mountain stream but gets snatched by an eagle.
In some families the way a husband sees things sets the standards regulations for the household.
A TV show called "exchangeing husbands" where 2 husbands replace each other for a day.
Out of two potential husbands, which would you approve of? Well, the one with shells (money) of course!!!
When a submarine or similar vessel submerges an exchange of air for water takes place in special compartments.
The drop falling here is the husband's toupee... he's already lost his hair once, now he's loseing it again. Such is life, I suppose.
Iron is a metal that gradually becomes lost due to oxidation and rust.
When you get lost, you just take an alternate road to get back on track.

A retainer is a servant, especially one who has worked for a person, such as a feudal official, or a family for a long time. Now, if you imagine looking at a retainer (e.g. Igor) from top, you see how he is bending his head (middle rectange) between his two shoulders as he offers something with his two hands (upper and lower lines) to his master.
Princess Leia becomes Jabba's slave (“princess Leia is a woman slave”).
The storehouse is overgrown with goods and slaves are moving them around.  The good the slaves like they hide and take home later.
You signed your organ donor card, right? So, when you die, your entrails, guts and other body parts will be placed in a storehouse.
An intelligent man is neither slave to his crotch nor to money and therefore worthy of both.
The strict and firm parents think kids are "slaves to their crotch", so they ground them.

The slave likes to look to the future when one day he thinks "I will be about to recline with all my goods, when my wife walks through the door and children come home from school. When that day comes I shall be truly happy" he sighs.
The slave reclines on the floor at night with a nice view of the sky, and has a perusal of the stars.

This is actually the top view of a porn star with a gigantic erect penis. The top and bottom are his arms and the middle is his penis. Imagine him making the pumping motion while he's banging some chick. The arms move in, the penis moves out and vice versa.
Having gigantic fingers is useful to repel insects and refuse them access to your food.
I always refer to the power of the KATAKANA "KA".

Male is seen here as muscles working in the field, in other words working in the rice fields is the work of the male who are usually stronger. This is more or less the meaning of the original Chinese character.
Those jocks who always tried to show their muscles in the schoolhouse are now the ones out there doing manual labor jobs while we sit here and learn Japanese. Ha!
The necromancer hangs out at the local graveyard and uses his dark powers to recruit an army of undead. Emphasize the verb form to keep distinct from the noun cadet (#1173).
I have an inferiority complex because I have fewer muscles than everyone else at the gym. They all look like Macho Man Randy Savage (power) to me.
The great achievements of humankind, were crafts completed by muscle power: the pyramids, the Eiffel tower, etc.
It's not well known but a pegasus has the power to persuade and you'll let it advise you after only a short chat.
Guy + Power: To reach a position of power in the company, the average guy has to toil very hard for many years.
Ten thousand Persians are at the base of the cliff, but the leader of the 300 Spartans just flexes his huge muscles and encourages his men by shouting that they have the power to fight them all.
If you eat anymore, you will be adding more カロries. (katakana karo).
When someone at work gets married, you pass around an envelope to which you add some money and a card which you sign with your congratulations.
Add wood to the wall to erect a shelf.
What part of the body has a very, very, very powerful smell? The armpit, of course!
When you hold muscles above your body your posture becomes quite threatening.
The nurse says : "If you co-operate, that needle in your triceps won't hurt. So please cooperate."
To me, this looks like a bridge going over a body of water, being supported by columns underneath it. It's could be a good line of business if you put a toll booth at one end.
The calligrapher's brush is moving down a column of a script, in rhythm with his meditation like it's following the law.
Before going all the way to the Boss in a Final Fantasy game, you should probably double back to save at a restore point.
To gain more knowledge of what's goin on in the world I'm reading column after column of articles in the newspapers, and it takes so much time I'm glued to it till nightbreak, but I must keep going.
The line of viking soldiers is always accompanyed by a horn mending specialist.
The junior employee has to be a follower of his superiors orders, going here and there to line up for coffee and food.
A line queued up outside the Buddhist temple, waiting to see the shrine on New Year's Day which is a real treat.
In Medieval Japan, going to see your lord was often a long journey towards the closest town.
A long time ago a kingdom would go on an expedition to get new land and subjugate the people there to new laws.
People line up for toilet paper and the line starts to trail around itself In a circle making the diameter bigger and bigger.
He has a column over his pants but the other has a pelt covering her chest.
People line up to do their duty and serve their country by shooting missiles.
A file of people line up to see the ten commandements so they can learn what true benevolence and morality is.
To bring up children well they are made to line up to get a thorough education by the taskmaster.  He the only one who can penetrate their young brains.
If you see a column of kings being marched up the mountain under a taskmaster's whip... indications are, there has been a coup. Don't try to solicit an answer from anyone.  Just stay away.
Penal servitude (punishment) is served until indications show that one has had a change of heart and has been chastened (subdued).

The tiny column of 300 spartans were in a delicate situation. They had travelled in one line through the deadly wind (using only their legs) to the mountain pass to face the fierce Persian taskmaster.
The boulevard of boulevards (streets), the Champs Elysées, a long column with the Arc de Triomphe covered in ivy to give the champions a heroes' welcome.
The weight is too much so your St. Bernard helps you to carry the fish thus getting some equilibrium (balance) while walking down the boulevard.
The first DRAFT of catcher in the rye was actually called "catcher in the TALL WHEAT"...good thing they changed it. I read it in 高校.
Your earnings allow you to bring home your daily bread (made of wheat crops, naturally).
The extent to which some people will go on little journeys to create 'wheat displays', or as some call them 'crop circles', is truly amazing.

Nobody likes the tax man, so here it is only fitting that the person who comes over to take some of your wheat is depicted here as a devil. Keep in mind that in feudal societies there was no kind of money to speak of, so taxes were paid by serfs in wheat to the devils who came over to keep them poor.
Immature turkeys are stuffed with wheat to make it look bigger.
The first step to harmony is having enough wheat to feed every mouth in the world. Once we are all fed it is easier to get a long in harmony.
Picture the WHEAT field, filled with MANY, MANY stalks of WHEAT. Notice how they SHIFT like waves in the slightest breeze. When you hear SHIFT, just picture that scene.

Behold Mr. T (of "A-Team" fame)! I chose Mr. T because he's sure to make amusing stories. He is easy to imagine, the heavy gold chains are probably the most prominent feature of the character. And last but not least you can always pepper your story with the famous line “I pity da foo!” * Fittingly, on the left side of the kanji, it looks like a “T”.

Mr. T's assistant is on his left. Why? Because Mr T has this bad habit of suddenly extending his right arm (what with all the boxing that he did), and his assistant got inadvertently punched in the face more than once (ouch). So now his assistant is always to his left side, much safer - "Stay on my left, foo!".
